website_summaries.verdict: Versatile springform pan set, offering 3 pans for a reasonable price.
pros: Set consists of 7", 9", and 10" springform pans, giving you plenty of options for cooking
Non-stick steel surface in the pans is safe for all foods and is easy to clean up afterward
Safe to use in the oven at cooking temperatures up to 450°F
cons: Manufacturing quality is not uniform from pan to pan, leaving a sight oval shape in some pans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baking!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my hubby as he is on a baking kick. They work wonderfully. Two cakes made so far and no complaints. We hand wash and dry our pans. They hold up fantastic in the oven and do exactly what they are designed for. Very good materials and they latch easily.
customer_reviews.author: L Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for 3. Love the different sizes and ease of use/cleaning. The only problem is my large one came in dented and now it doesn’t seal perfectly. I’ll probably have to use that one for things like no-bake cheesecakes
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Schuetz

customer_reviews.title: Dashed hopes for a round cheesecake pan
customer_reviews.text: Largest was dented, thus not round for cheesecake and leaked because dented side was at the hinge. Middle one was shaped more like an egg. Smallest was in great shape. When using, needed to line up dented sides perfectly to minimize leaking. Needed immediately so i couldn't return. Dismayed. Never thought that i would receive damaged pans.
customer_reviews.author: JanLayMay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baking multi tiered cakes!
customer_reviews.text: I made my daughters 5th birthday cake with these. They are very easy to clean! Very sturdy pans. I didnt have an issue with leakage through the seams of the pans. Very recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssia

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for any baker beginner or advance! I love to use mine for cheesecakes and even can fit the smaller one into my instant pot for dumplings!
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie Gates

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously Dented! UGH. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Largest pan was dented upon arrival. they were wrapped in bubble wrap so I know the company is trying. The two little ones were great but... The large one was the only reason I bought the set.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan N

customer_reviews.title: NOT leakproof
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as being leakproof. This is not true. The first time I used it for a birthday cake, it leaked almost half of the batter, b and I had to air out the house and clean the oven.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Look Nice and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Look nice and sturdy. I have no idea if they stick or if they warp or not because I just received them and have not had a chance to use yet.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift. Recipient was very pleased to receive.
customer_reviews.author: Benderover89

customer_reviews.title: sizes are perfect but it leaks
customer_reviews.text: those pans leaks but the size is perfect, so i just cover them with foil and place them in other bigger pan when baking.
customer_reviews.author: samar al masraf

customer_reviews.title: I did not use these yet I will update they look good
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made I did not use these yet I used a similar set and they work great looks to be quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jd family

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizes for a beautiful 3 tier cake. Also great for cheesecakes. Non stick coating makes cleaning a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Rich McKimmie

customer_reviews.title: My cook uses these
customer_reviews.text: My cook uses these. She has not complained. So I guess they work well.
customer_reviews.author: S. O'H

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to make a non bake cheesecake amazing really good and my cheezcake came perfect
customer_reviews.author: She-Trucker

customer_reviews.title: Nice pans
customer_reviews.text: Love the pans just have an issue with the small one leaking
customer_reviews.author: ronda29

customer_reviews.title: No leaks
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great and at a great price. Spring works smoothly and the pans DO NOT leak. I made cheese in mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Leakage!
customer_reviews.text: I used them today for the first time and they leak, it ruined the bottom of my stove, how can this be resolved?
customer_reviews.author: Alex golden

customer_reviews.title: They are efficient
customer_reviews.text: I wish they came with covers. Otherwise they were great
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Greasy residue leaked from pans, smelled of burnt chemicals
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE!!! The pans leaked of a greasy residue all over the bottom of my oven with smoke everywhere that smelled of burnt chemicals. Not only that, but a fire started in my oven on the greasy residue! It wasn’t the batter leaking, but something from the actual pans. The three cheesecakes I was making were obviously completely ruined and my whole house had to be ventilated all day to get some of the smoke and smell out. It was terrible. Do not buy. Very defective product! I just had to throw them out. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Caden

customer_reviews.title: The locking mechanism is tight which is key to a leak free experience
customer_reviews.text: I used the 9" pan to make a homemade Torta pasta dish that requires pouring in raw beaten eggs. I did wrap the bottom of the pan with foil in case of leakage, which I have had in the past with other pans. I was pleasantly surprised to find that the Torta cooked perfectly without any leakage. I am looking forward to trying these pans with a more traditional dessert recipe.I feel confidant that these pans will serve me well.
customer_reviews.author: microshredder

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I couldn't find my old ones ( which of course I found 2 days after getting these. They have a nice finish. I've already used the 9" one and it turned out a stunning cheesecake. It cleaned up easily. I wound up giving my old ones away because these are nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I just used the middle sized pan so far (for sweet potato bebinca - it's kind of like a sweet quiche with a lot of sweet potato in it - yum!). Worked great. Easy to clean, but the bottom rolled edge did require the sharp point of a knife to get some tenacious bits out.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lupton

customer_reviews.title: Covers all the usual sizes
customer_reviews.text: I really only needed the 10" for a recipe but decided to get this set so I'd have all the common sizes covered. When assembled properly (ahem!) they are indeed leakproof and are easy to clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Duane B.

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️ Them
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: They are ok to use. I am happy with them but I will continue to look for something a little more industrial quality
customer_reviews.author: DH4U

customer_reviews.title: Real nice pans
customer_reviews.text: Real nice springform pans in a set of 3 various sizes. Great price. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mike44NH

customer_reviews.title: Pans for cheesecake
customer_reviews.text: Made my first cheesecake with these pans. Great outcome. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D Wilkin

product_meta.title: Tebery 3 Pack 7" 9" 10" Non-stick Springform Cake Pan Set Leakproof Round Cake Pan with Quick Release Clips and Removable Waffle Texture Bottoms - Black
feature_bullets: Package includes 3 springform pans; 7" in dia. x 2-1/8" deep, 9" in dia. x 2-1/2" deep, 10" in dia. x 2-1/2" deep.
Made of steel; non-stick surface for easy release and quick cleanup.
Springform buckle provides easy release of baked goods and leak-proof tight seal prevents messy spills.
Oven safe to 450 degrees Fahrenheit. Hand wash recommended.
Three different size cake pan can be used to create beautiful three layer cakes suited for any occasion.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars117 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
